content.description:
Gear Grinder climbs a perfect slab over a good landing.

Stand start on the edge about one foot off the ground. From there, reach an incut right hand sidepull, move a left hand to an oblique incut crimp, walk the feet on a smear, gain a high right foot edge, stick the lip, and mantle atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work fine, the landing is flat, and there is a tree behind the problem, but it really doesn't pose a risk.
content.location: It climbs the north-facing slab on Palaceer.

climbs.name: Death Is The Grower Of Time

content.description: Stand start with hands matched on the crack about four feet off the ground. From there, bump the right hand up to a sidepull, follow to a small left hand crimp, move the right hand up to a good sidepull, follow with both hands to a crimp rail, hit the lip, and top it out.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work. The immediate landing is great, but there is a large, benign rock to the side of the problem.
content.location: It climbs the the vertical face using the crack/dihedral feature.
